```{r knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)}
A <- matrix(1:9, nrow = 3, ncol = 3)
A
B <- matrix(1:9, ncol = 3)
B
dim(A)
dim(B)
#Scalar Multiplication
s <- 10
s*A
#Matrix Multiplication
A%*%B
#Matrix Addition
A + B
#Matrix Subtraction
A - B
#Matrix Transpose
t(A)
t(B)
```
